subjectCode.description: Trading Impact (ICE Codes) Important Corporate Events

text:
05 une 2020pplied raphene aterials plc("pplied raphene aterials", "", "the
roup" or "the ")pplied raphene aterials signs distribution agreement with
ichem olymers , reece.greement provides with a strong route into the reek
coatings and polymers markets.pplied raphene aterials (:), is pleased to
announce it has signed an exclusive distribution agreement with ichem olymers
(eadquarters charnes, reece). he agreement helps to extend 's commercial reach
directly into the coatings and polymers sectors across reece.ounded in 1977,
ichem roup, has a strong history of delivering high performance chemicals to a
wide range of markets including cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, food industry,
polymers and coatings. he company's focus on supporting customers, with their
specialist, technical focus, allows them the opportunity to actively
participate in & programmes to establish new technologies in their selected
sector. and ichem have an exclusive agreement that will see the two companies
collaborate on customer opportunities and introduce 's proprietaryenablen
addition to its own commercial hubs in the .. and the nited tates, now has
distribution agreements with local expert chemicals and coatings distributors
in reece, taly, outh frica and apan.drian otts, commented:" am delighted to be
able to continue the development of our platform for revenue generation with
the addition of ichem olymers to the commercial team. aving done the hard work
of developing graphene dispersions as the primary route to utilisation of
nanoplatelet technology, we are pleased to be able to offer our standardised
product offering to the global market through a strong distribution network
across a growing number of countries. e are keen to advance our development
pipeline for revenue through this approach from the sale of both our easy-to-
useenable® dispersions as well as customised product offerings to suit
individual customer project requirements."emetrios kikas. ichem olymers
commented:e are very pleased to have started a collaboration with , a highly
innovative organisation, with a technology that we expect to have significant
growth in the oatings ndustry in the coming years. e believe that our long-
standing relationships with local customers on one hand, and the high level of
expertise of on the other, will provide a clear benefit for those seeking a
high-quality solution in certain sections of the aint ndustry. rom our side we
will do all we can to ensure this collaboration is very successful.bout ichem
olymers ichem olymers is active in the stocking and distribution of chemical
raw materials for the construction, paint, insulation, packaging and signage
industry. he company has been operating for 20 years in the reek market where
it also represents some of the largest international brands, constantly
broadening its product, customer and supplier portfolio. ichem olymers' highly
trained and skilled technical staff provide technical support at all levels
(research, development and production of the final
product).<http://www.dichem.gr/index.php?lang=or> further information, please
contact:+44 (0) 1642 438 214drian otts, hief xecutive fficeravid lain, hief
inancial fficerotes to ditorspplied raphene aterials works in partnership with
its customers using its knowledge and expertise to provide bespoke graphene
dispersions and formats to deliver enhancements and benefits for a wide range
of applications. he roup's strategy is to target commercial applications in
three core markets: coatings, composites and functional materials.he roup has
developed proprietary bottom-up processes which are capable of producing high
purity graphene nanoplatelets using a continuous process. he manufacturing
process is based on sustainable, readily available raw materials and therefore
does not rely on the supply of graphite, unlike a number of other graphene
production techniques. pplied raphene aterials owns the intellectual property
and know-how behind this process.pplied raphene aterials was founded by
rofessor arl oleman in 2010 with its operations and processes based on
technology that he initially developed at urham niversity. he roup was
admitted to in ovember 2013, raising £11 million, and is based at the ilton
ite on eesside.n anuary 2016 the roup raised £8.5m to support its ongoing
activities and in ctober 2017 the roup raised a further £9.8m.

title: Applied Graphene : Signature of distribution agreement [Company Announcements for Eland Oil & Gas PLC]

a strong route into the reek coatings and polymers markets.pplied raphene aterials (:), is pleased to announce it has signed an exclusive distribution agreement with ichem olymers (eadquarters charnes, reece). he agreement helps to extend 's commercial reach directly into the coatings and polymers sectors across reece.ounded in 1977, ichem roup, has a strong history of delivering high performance chemicals to a wide range of markets including cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, food industry, polymers and coatings. he company's focus on supporting customers, with their specialist, technical focus, allows them the opportunity to actively participate in & programmes to establish new technologies in their selected sector. and ichem have an exclusive agreement that will see the two chemicals and coatings distributors in reece, taly, outh frica and apan.drian otts, commented:" am delighted to be able to continue the development of our platform for revenue generation with the addition of ichem olymers to the commercial team. aving done the hard work of developing graphene dispersions as the primary route to utilisation of nanoplatelet technology, we are pleased to be able to offer our standardised product offering to the global market through a strong distribution network across a growing number of countries. e are keen to advance our development pipeline for revenue through this approach from the sale of both our easy-to-useenable® dispersions as well as customised product offerings to suit individual customer project requirements."emetrios kikas. ichem olymers commented:e are very pleased to have started a collaboration with , a highly innovative organisation, with a technology that we expect to have significant growth in the oatings ndustry in the coming enhancements and benefits for a wide range of applications. he roup's strategy is to target commercial applications in three core markets: coatings, composites and functional materials.he roup has developed proprietary bottom-up processes which are capable of producing high purity graphene nanoplatelets using a continuous process. he manufacturing process is based on sustainable, readily available raw materials and therefore does not rely on the supply of graphite, unlike a number of other graphene production techniques. pplied raphene aterials owns the intellectual property and
